title: Drawing, "The Prelate and Stool-Bearers and Women near Them in "Expulsion of Heliodorus" after Raphael Sanzio", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on laid paper
markings: Watermark: point of lily in double circle with CB
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Prelate and Stool-Bearers and Women near Them in "Expulsion of Heliodorus" after Raphael Sanzio", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2053.
